Class UserDBMS

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserDBMS

  • public class UserDBMS
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows Users to query the UserDatabase. User class does not have a direct reference to UserDatabase, but UserDBMS.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewTweet(Tweet tweet)
      Adds a Tweet to the database
      boolean doesUserIdExist(java.lang.String userId)
      Returns true if a User with a given user id exists in the database
      static UserDBMS getInstance(UserDatabase database)
      Singleton method
      User getUserFromDatabase(java.lang.String userId)
      Returns true if a UserGroup with a given group id exists in the database

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • doesUserIdExist

        public boolean doesUserIdExist(java.lang.String userId)
        Returns true if a User with a given user id exists in the database
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id to look for
        Returns:
        true if a User exists in the database

      • getUserFromDatabase

        public User getUserFromDatabase(java.lang.String userId)
        Returns true if a UserGroup with a given group id exists in the database
        Parameters:
        userId - the group id to look for
        Returns:
        true if a GroupUser exists in the database

      • addNewTweet

        public void addNewTweet(Tweet tweet)
        Adds a Tweet to the database
        Parameters:
        tweet - a Tweet instance

      • getInstance

        public static UserDBMS getInstance(UserDatabase database)
        Singleton method
        Parameters:
        database - is sent to the UserDBMS constructor
        Returns:
        a new UserDBMS instance if it is null, otherwise returns itself.
